definition: to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together
ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome
variant of 鬥牛梗|斗牛梗[dou4 niu2 geng3]
Toreador Song (Votre toast, je peux vous le rendre), famous aria from opera Carmen 卡門|卡门 by Georges Bizet

sentences.english: Today play bullfight lose 1500 dollars depressing dead.
sentences.chinese: 今天打鬥牛輸啦1500塊錢鬱悶死了。

sentences.english: He has vowed never to enter the ring again.
sentences.chinese: 他發誓再也不進鬥牛場了。

sentences.english: Most matadors have been seriously injured by a bull.
sentences.chinese: 大部分鬥牛士曾經因鬥牛而嚴重受傷。

sentences.english: Most matadors have been seriously injured by a bull.
sentences.chinese: 大部分鬥牛士曾經因鬥牛而嚴重受傷。

sentences.english: The history of bull fighting stretches back millennia.
sentences.chinese: 鬥牛的歷史迄今已有一千多年了。

sentences.english: I like Picasso's drawings of bullfighters.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡畢加索描繪鬥牛士的畫作。

sentences.english: Those on the receiving end exited the bloody bullring.
sentences.chinese: 在接收端那些退出了血腥的鬥牛場。

sentences.english: Spain are used everywhere in place of the march, dance paso doble.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙的每一個地方都是用鬥牛舞代替行軍舞。

sentences.english: Unlike standard bullfights, the bulls are not killed in these events.
sentences.chinese: 與標準鬥牛不同，這些牛在比賽中不被宰殺。

sentences.english: Paso doble is also introduced, the two expressions will be quite different.
sentences.chinese: 同樣是介紹鬥牛舞，兩人的表述方式就大不一樣。

sentences.english: Villalta - A great bullfighter , he is described in Chapter XII.
sentences.chinese: 偉大的鬥牛士，他所描述的第十二章。

sentences.english: He brought no milk with him, but two tickets for a bull-fight down on their table.
sentences.chinese: 他沒帶來牛奶，卻把兩張鬥牛門票放在了桌上。

sentences.english: Bulldogs were also used for protection against other carnivorous wild animals.
sentences.chinese: 鬥牛狗也用於保護人們免遭其他食肉動物的傷害。

sentences.english: There are traditional performances of wrestling and bull-fighting.
sentences.chinese: 傳統的表演有摔跤和鬥牛。

sentences.english: As a matador you have a deep connection with the bulls.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一名鬥牛士，你與公牛有一種深厚的聯繫。

definition: to have a unique style of one's own (idiom)
type of opera from Taiwan and Fujian
lit. a pair of birds flying close together (idiom)/fig. two hearts beating as one/name of a sweet and sour chicken wing dish
